name: grappler
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone, especially a wrestler, who fights with an opponent while holding onto them: The ring moved every time a grappler was thrown to the ropes. I do not consider myself a superb grappler - I'd rather use strikes and kicks to defend myself.
More examplesFewer examplesHuerta became a top-ranked grappler in his senior year. She is a champion heavyweight grappler who is following in the footsteps of her pro wrestler father.I'm not that keen on the oiled grapplers of the World Wrestling Foundation.
